title: Bizana Pondo Chiefs F.C.
text:
Bizana Pondo Chiefs is a South African professional <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in Mhlanga Location in <a href="Bizana%2C%20Eastern%20Cape">Bizana</a>, <a href="Eastern%20Cape">Eastern Cape</a>, founded in 2015.
They earned promotion to the <a href="National%20First%20Division">National First Division</a> after winning the <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20SAFA%20Second%20Division">2019–20 SAFA Second Division</a>, but finished bottom in the <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20National%20First%20Division">2020–21 National First Division</a>, and were relegated to the <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20SAFA%20Second%20Division">2020–21 SAFA Second Division</a>.
They are known as the lions of Skoomplas.
